content: निगमः {@--1@} The Veda or Vedic text; साढ्यै साढ्वा साढेति निगमे <ls>P. VI. 3. 113</ls>, <ls n="P.">VII. 2. 64</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Any passage or word quoted from the Vedas, a Vedic sentence; तथापि च निगमो भवति (often found in Nirukta). {@--3@} A work auxiliary to, and explanatory of, the Vedas; <ls>Ms. 4. 19</ls> and <ls>Kull.</ls> thereon. {@--4@} A sacred precept, the words of a god or holy man. {@--5@} A root (as the source of a word). {@--6@} Certainty, assurance. {@--7@} Logic. {@--8@} Trade, traffic. {@--9@} A market, fair. {@--10@} A caravan of wandering merchants. {@--11@} A road, market-road. {@--12@} A city. {@--13@} Insertion of the name of a deity into a liturgical formula.
